nodes.text: Raven Squad was a prestigious Special Forces unit of the reconstituted Sith Empire's military that was deployed on Ossus during the Invasion of Ossus. The squad was based in Strike Base XR-484.

Although Darth Malora was originally in charge of the invasion force, her alchemy experiments with the Geonosians greatly jeopardized the lives of the Imperials. She was not very popular among Raven Squad; Major Anri especially had a very low opinion of the Dark Lord.
The members of Raven Squad consistently referred to the base as "the Nest," a term that Darth Malora pointedly refused to use during the Invasion of Ossus.

On behalf of the Sith Empire's leading figure, Darth Malgus was dispatched to Ossus and assumed command over the entire invasion force. Raven Squad hailed Darth Malgus as a more popular war hero and assisted during the attack on the Great Jedi Library.
